verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> [Tmiz-MorA Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD בְּעָזְּךָ֥ <S%H5797><s%> be-'az-ze-Cha in thy strength יִשְׂמַח־ <S%H8055><s%> yis-mach- shall joy מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech; The king וּ֝בִישׁ֥וּעָתְךָ֗ <S%H3444><s%> u-vi-Shu-'a-te-cha, and in thy salvation מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- how יָּ֥גֶיל <S%H1523><s%> Ya-geil shall he rejoice מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. how greatly

תַּאֲוַ֣ת <S%H8378><s%> ta-'a-Vat desire לִ֭בּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-bo him his heart's נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah Thou hast given לּ֑וֹ lo; וַאֲרֶ֥שֶׁת <S%H782><s%> va-'a-Re-shet the request שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> fa-Tav, of his lips בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- have not מָנַ֥עְתָּ <S%H4513><s%> ma-Na'-ta and hast not withholden סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תְ֭קַדְּמֶנּוּ <S%H6923><s%> Te-kad-de-men-nu For thou preventest בִּרְכ֣וֹת <S%H1293><s%> bir-Chot him with the blessings ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; of goodness תָּשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> ta-Shit thou settest לְ֝רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> le-ro-Sho, on his head עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> 'a-Te-ret a crown פָּֽז׃ <S%H6337><s%> Paz. of pure gold

חַיִּ֤ים׀ <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim life שָׁאַ֣ל <S%H7592><s%> sha-'Al He asked מִ֭מְּךָ <S%H4480><s%> Mi-me-cha at נָתַ֣תָּה <S%H5414><s%> na-Tat-tah of thee [and] thou gavest לּ֑וֹ lo; אֹ֥רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech [it] him [even] length יָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim, of days עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> va-'Ed. and ever

גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] great כְּ֭בוֹדוֹ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-do His glory בִּישׁוּעָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H3444><s%> bi-shu-'a-Te-cha; in thy salvation ה֥וֹד <S%H1935><s%> Hod honour וְ֝הָדָר <S%H1926><s%> Ve-ha-dor and majesty תְּשַׁוֶּ֥ה <S%H7737><s%> te-shav-Veh hast thou laid עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. and

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תְשִׁיתֵ֣הוּ <S%H7896><s%> te-shi-Te-hu For thou hast made בְרָכ֣וֹת <S%H1293><s%> ve-ra-Chot him most blessed לָעַ֑ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad; for ever תְּחַדֵּ֥הוּ <S%H2302><s%> te-chad-De-hu thou hast made בְ֝שִׂמְחָ֗ה <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah, him exceeding glad אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- in פָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha. with thy countenance

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For הַ֭מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Ham-Me-lech For the king בֹּטֵ֣חַ <S%H982><s%> bo-Te-ach trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD וּבְחֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> u-ve-Che-sed and through the mercy עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon, of the most High בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- lest יִמּֽוֹט׃ <S%H4131><s%> yim-Mot. he shall not be moved

תִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza shall find out יָ֭דְךָ <S%H3027><s%> Ya-de-cha Thine hand לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all אֹיְבֶ֑יךָ <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vei-cha; all thine enemies יְ֝מִֽינְךָ <S%H3225><s%> Ye-mi-ne-cha thy right hand תִּמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza shall find out שֹׂנְאֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ei-cha. those that hate

תְּשִׁיתֵ֤מוֹ׀ <S%H7896><s%> te-shi-Te-mov Thou shalt make כְּתַנּ֥וּר <S%H8574><s%> ke-tan-Nur oven אֵשׁ֮ <S%H784><s%> 'esh them as a fiery לְעֵ֪ת <S%H6256><s%> le-'Et in the time פָּ֫נֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha of thine anger יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּאַפּ֣וֹ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Po in his wrath יְבַלְּעֵ֑ם <S%H1104><s%> ye-val-le-'Em; shall swallow them up וְֽתֹאכְלֵ֥ם <S%H398><s%> ve-to-che-Lem shall devour אֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh. and the fire

פִּ֭רְיָמוֹ <S%H6529><s%> pir-ya-mo Their fruit מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz from the earth תְּאַבֵּ֑ד <S%H6><s%> te-'ab-Bed; shalt thou destroy וְ֝זַרְעָ֗ם <S%H2233><s%> ve-zar-'Am, and their seed מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam. of men

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Though נָט֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> na-Tu For they intended עָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha against רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah; evil חָֽשְׁב֥וּ <S%H2803><s%> cha-she-Vu against thee they imagined מְ֝זִמָּ֗ה <S%H4209><s%> me-zim-Mah, a mischievous device בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> bal- They will not יוּכָֽלוּ׃ <S%H3201><s%> yu-Cha-lu. [which] they are not able

כִּ֭י <S%H3588><s%> ki for תְּשִׁיתֵ֣מוֹ <S%H7896><s%> te-shi-Te-mov Therefore shalt thou make שֶׁ֑כֶם <S%H7926><s%> She-chem; them turn their back בְּ֝מֵֽיתָרֶ֗יךָ <S%H4340><s%> be-mei-ta-Rei-cha, [thine arrows] upon thy strings תְּכוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> te-cho-Nen [when] thou shalt make ready עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> pe-nei-Hem. against the face

ר֣וּמָה <S%H7311><s%> Ru-mah Be thou exalted יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD בְּעֻזֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5797><s%> ve-'uz-Ze-cha; in thine own strength נָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> na-Shi-rah [so] will we sing וּֽ֝נְזַמְּרָה <S%H2167><s%> U-ne-zam-me-rah and praise גְּבוּרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1369><s%> ge-vu-ra-Te-cha. thy power
